au.edu.deakin.ice.meltdown.entities

Class RockFall

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.edu.deakin.ice.meltdown.GameObject
      • au.edu.deakin.ice.meltdown.entities.Threat
        • au.edu.deakin.ice.meltdown.entities.RockFall

  • public class RockFall
extends Threat
    Rockfall falls from the top of the screen before being removed, it's behaviour is like Threat in all other ways.
    Author:
    Steven
